name: No Adblock
author: Verblick Dev

sections.description:
This plugin will detect adblock users and blocking them from seeing your site content.

Why Blocking Adblock ?

Nowadays, millions of sites survive to bring out valuable information for free to its visitors. This is achieved through having advertisements on their site to finance its existence.

Friendly Blocking Messages

The blocking message is presented with user in mind where its presentation to the sites’ visitors are friendly.

Fully Customizable Text

The message is fully customizable where the site’s administrator can deliver the message in ways it sees best fit its visitors.

Fast and Easy to Implement

The configuration is created with a goal to allow the administrator to create a NoAdblock message fast and easy!

Increase Ads Performance

This tool will allow sites to protect itself, allowing it to maintain and grow its ads revenue as its visitor base increases.

Template tags

You don’t need template tag for this plugin
sections.installation:
Use WordPress’ Add New Plugin feature, searching “No Adblock”, or download the archive and:

  1. Upload noadblock directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Adblock located in Left Sidebar and customize behavior as needed
sections.faq:
The plugin doesn’t work, why?

Try de-activate and activate it again
